problem.p:
Two particles have masses \(3m\) and \(2m\) and speeds \(v\) and \(2v\), respectively. In each of the three different scenarios, the particles collide inelastically and stick together after the collision.
Scenario A. The particles move toward each other and collide head-on.
Scenario B. Particle 2m chases particle m and collides with it from behind.
Scenario C. The particles move at right angles before the collision.
Rank these three scenarios in the order of decreasing amount of heat generated in the collision.
